description: Hailed by Harima Kenji as a very accurate fortune-teller, Alexander predicts the food preferences of Sawachika Eri`s father, stating that he prefers curry over nikujaga. The most significant point is that this incurs on Eri`s wrath, as she recognizes Harima under his fortune-teller disguise, and knowing that he himself likes curry, she believes him to be telling lies.
name: Alexander
